price: Dies, weil Allah die Nacht in den Tag eindringen und den Tag in die Nacht eindringen läßt und weil Allah Allhörend und Allsehend ist.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُولِجُ ٱلَّيۡلَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha yūliju al-layla fī al-nahāri wayūliju al-nahāra fī al-layli wa-anna al-laha samīʿun baṣīrun
